00043 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00044 {
00045    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00046    MPI::Init();
00047    McMd::McSimulation simulation(MPI::COMM_WORLD);
00048    #else
00049    McMd::McSimulation simulation;
00050    #endif
00051 
00052    // Process command line options
00053    simulation.setOptions(argc, argv);
00054 
00055    // Read parameters from default parameter file
00056    simulation.readParam();
00057    
00058    // Read command script to run simulation
00059    simulation.readCommands();
00060 
00061    #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00062    MPI::Finalize();
00063    #endif
00064 
00065    return 0;
00066 }
